locations.name: Central Valley
locations.description: The starting point, likely near San José or Alajuela, characterized by rolling green hills, coffee estates, and cultural introduction.

locations.name: Arenal Volcano Area
locations.description: Region centered around the Arenal Volcano (near La Fortuna town), known for volcanic views, thermal hot springs, and adventure activities like zip-lining and hanging bridges.

locations.name: Osa Peninsula
locations.description: A remote and highly biodiverse peninsula in the south, primary access point for Corcovado National Park, offering immersive rainforest and wildlife experiences.

locations.name: Manuel Antonio
locations.description: Pacific coast destination known for its scenic beaches adjacent to Manuel Antonio National Park, offering a blend of relaxation and accessible wildlife viewing.
